mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weixin_third_user (user_id, openid, access_token, expires_in, refresh_token, scope, nickname, sex, province, city, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{openid}, #{accessToken}, #{expiresIn}, #{refreshToken}, #{scope}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{province}, #{country}, #{headimgurl}, #{privilege}, #{unionid}, now(), now())
